summary:
I am an Independent FREELANCE Photographer, Artist, Designer, Healer, Teacher/Consultant and Traveler. 
My company 'Amsterdhami' based now in Bangalore promotes Nature with deep connection to the Elements - Water, Earth, Wind and Fire through innovation, Creativity & Alternative Photography, Art, Design, Interiors and Fashion.

profile_positions.description:
Amsterdhami was born in Amsterdam, while I was looking to connect to Nature in the Netherlands. 
I started photographing the Reflections in the Waters of Canals in Amsterdam around my home.....and captured photographs in different seasons and spaces, bringing out a Completely New and Fresh Way to Connect to WATER & Nature around us and within us. 

My excitement while studying my photographs and works of people in different parts of the globe was limitless and this discovery had no boundaries with scope stretching to all aspects of life. 
I found ways to bring these REFLECTIONS in Water into living spaces of individuals, corporates and organizations including public spaces as Art, Interior and fashion objects with Deeper meaning then just decoration. 
People connected Spiritually to my work and saw the relevance in their personal life including their connection to Nature and Relationships with other People and inner self. 

These beautiful reflections are abstracts in form, color, shape and patterns but are real and exist in all waters with different look and dynamics......!

I see my LIFE REFLECTING in them and a New Journey Started for me. I decided to work with nature while understanding the simple but subtle details that most often we overlook...like simple joys that keep us happy. 
It has been over 6 years and I am getting stronger by the day as an individual and my work and attitude inspires Thousands of individuals from all parts of the world.....! 

These reflections are timeless but contemporary for all ages....like our belief in Truth and Co-existence as being connected to NATURE.....Nurturing and Feeding on it....! 

Come Discover the SPIRITUALITY of Our Inner Self, Elements of Earth and the Universe at Large.

Connect to Water...Connect to Nature.....Connect to Self.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
I Traveled alone in India, mainly Indian Himalayas West of Nepal from Uttranchal to Ladakh for 5 yrs, quitting my comfortable teaching job. 
Like Buddha, I started on Self Discovery, living a simple adventurous life of a traveler meeting diverse Nature and Humanity....Many time it was difficult to get basics like food and shelter, but my commitment and rewards of understanding my life and a new PURE connection to World Outside me was too strong to be bothered by survival and securities people amass.
I spent weeks together in high mountains in snow and glaciers alone away from humanity including animals and plants, connecting purely to the basic elements-water, earth, wind, fire and the Spiritual Energies that sustain, manage and transform us and the Universe at large and keep us flowing like a lively river. 
Along my journey I came across ignorant, innocent and wise men, women, kids and elderly people that provided food for my Mind and Spirituality and lived in diverse nature tasting food and lifestyles of people from the world over.

I am still on this journey - little wise more innocent, mostly content with few needs, but very hungry too - for experiences that are yet to show me emotions that have bypassed me. Everyday is New and I am surprised like a little child.....this keeps me going.
This knowledge and understanding has come from people nature and Energies from close and far away in the day & the night and I appreciate GIVING AWAY in Equal Measures what I RECEIVE.......Everyday I am a Student and Teacher.......a Trader.......a Happy Being.

I am a Light Traveler.....One Bag and Tonnes of Memories.
profile_positions.title: Traveler, Photographer, Travel Guide & Consultant

skills: Teacher - Photography, Shiatsu, Team Building & Spiritaul guide
